name: William F. WEIDLE et al., Appellants, v. BUSTLETON DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: William F. WEIDLE et al., Appellants, v. BUSTLETON DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own cost.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alfred Francis Shea, Cornwells Heights, for appellants.
William J. Carlin, Bristol, Jay D. Barsky, Philadelphia, Begley, Carlin, Mandio, Kelton & Popkin, Bristol, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 458
William F. WEIDLE et al., Appellants, v. BUSTLETON DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 15, 1974.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
Alfred Francis Shea, Cornwells Heights, for appellants.
William J. Carlin, Bristol, Jay D. Barsky, Philadelphia, Begley, Carlin, Mandio, Kelton & Popkin, Bristol, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
